resources.string:
SEMAT allows your team to reflect on your team progress systemically and identity new tasks to help your team achieve its goal 
 
 It provides 
 - A holistic view of the project 
 - A structure for retrospective 
 - A mechanism for monitoring progress 
 - A mechanism for risk management 
 - A mechanism for steering projects 
 
 In a simple, lightweight, non-prescriptive and method-agnostic fashion.
